message:
Dear Reporting Manager,

A leave extension request has been submitted and requires your attention. Please find the details below:

- Employee Name: {{ doc.employee_name }}
- Employee ID: {{ doc.employee }}
- Leave Type: {{ doc.leave_type }}
- New Leave Period: {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.from_date,"dd-MM-yyyy") }} to {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.to_date,"dd-MM-yyyy") }}
- Leave Application Link: View Request

You are kindly requested to review this application and take the necessary action at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
HR System
name: Leave Extension Request Notification
subject: Leave Extension Requested by {{doc.employee_name}}
